trans-unit.source: Provides the event data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Using the capabilities of the Web Parts control set, it is possible to create a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar as capacidades do conjunto de controlo de peças Web, é possível criar uma ligação entre dois <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou outros controlos de servidor, com um controlo a agir como o fornecedor e a outro agir como o consumidor de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To form a connection, the two controls must reside in a zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control), and they must be designed correctly to share data through a common interface.
trans-unit.target: Para formar uma ligação, os controlos de dois têm de residir numa zona que herda do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe (tais como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>controlo), e têm de ser concebidas corretamente para partilhar dados através de uma interface comum.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre ligações de peças Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>e [descrição geral das ligações de peças Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class passes event data to methods that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegate to handle events.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartConnectionsEventArgs transmite dados de eventos para métodos que utilizam o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>delegado para processar eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: There are two such connection-related methods that raise events and use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to provide event data.
trans-unit.target: Existem dois esses métodos relacionados com a ligação que eventos e utilizam a classe de WebPartConnectionsEventArgs para fornecer dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Both are members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Ambos são membros de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event after two server controls have successfully connected, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event after two server controls have been disconnected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>método gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>eventos depois de dois controlos do servidor tiverem ligado com êxito e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>método gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>eventos depois de tem estado desligados dois controlos do servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Developers can create custom event handler methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> events, and in those methods, they can use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to access details of a connection.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores podem criar eventos personalizados, métodos de processador para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>eventos, e os métodos, podem utilizar a classe de WebPartConnectionsEventArgs para detalhes de acesso de uma ligação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: For example, a developer can declare the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute on the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assign to it a custom method name that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um programador pode declarar o `OnWebPartsConnected` atributo no `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e atribua-lhe um nome de método personalizado que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: In the custom handler method, developers can access the details of a connection by using the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs object that is passed to the method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método do processador personalizado, os programadores podem aceder os detalhes de uma ligação utilizando o objeto de WebPartConnectionsEventArgs que é transmitido ao método como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has two overloads of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartConnectionsEventArgs tem dois sobrecargas do construtor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor is the default; it initializes the property values for the class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>construtor é a predefinição; -inicializa os valores de propriedade de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor calls the default constructor, and then it also initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>construtor chama o construtor predefinido e, em seguida, também inicializa a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has several properties, all of which refer to the essential aspects of a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartConnectionsEventArgs tem várias propriedades, sendo todas consulte os aspetos essenciais de uma ligação de peças Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property refers to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object that represents the entire connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>propriedade se refere a associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objeto que representa a ligação completa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control acting as the provider in the connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>referências de propriedade um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou outro controlo de servidor a agir como o fornecedor de ligação e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A>referências de propriedade um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou controlo de servidor a agir como o consumidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the connection's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>propriedade referencia a ligação <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>referências de propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"></xref> class without requiring a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"> </xref> classe sem necessidade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Este é o construtor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: It does not require a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Não requer um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the values of its properties by assigning each of its connection-related parameter objects to the corresponding property.
trans-unit.target: O construtor inicializa os valores das propriedades através da atribuição de cada um dos respetivos objetos relacionados com a ligação parâmetro à propriedade correspondente.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: O controlo a agir como o fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de ligação do fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O controlo a agir como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de ligação de consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object is available.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor é utilizado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>o objeto está disponível.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou a agir como o fornecedor de controlo de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> para a ligação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou controlo de servidor a agir como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> para a ligação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto da ligação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object contains all the details of a Web Parts connection, including references to the provider control, the provider's connection point, the consumer control, and the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objeto contém todos os detalhes de uma ligação de peças Web, incluindo referências para o controlo de fornecedor, o ponto de ligação do fornecedor, o controlo de consumidor e o ponto de ligação de consumidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre ligações de peças Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [descrição geral das ligações de peças Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlar que está a agir como o consumidor na ligação.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Uma ligação entre controlos numa zona de peças Web requer um controlo para agir como o fornecedor e outra para agir como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada controlo também tem de ter um ponto de ligação se definido; no caso do consumidor, o ponto de ligação tem de ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre ligações de peças Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [descrição geral das ligações de peças Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> a agir como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> objeto da ligação atual.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Uma ligação entre controlos numa zona de peças Web requer um controlo para agir como o fornecedor e outra para agir como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada controlo também tem de ter um ponto de ligação se definido; no caso do consumidor, o ponto de ligação tem de ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre ligações de peças Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [descrição geral das ligações de peças Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> da ligação atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlar que está a agir como o fornecedor na ligação.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Uma ligação entre controlos numa zona de peças Web requer um controlo para agir como o fornecedor e outra para agir como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada controlo também tem de ter um ponto de ligação se definido; no caso do fornecedor, o ponto de ligação tem de ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre ligações de peças Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [descrição geral das ligações de peças Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> a agir como o fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> objeto da ligação atual.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Uma ligação entre controlos numa zona de peças Web requer um controlo para agir como o fornecedor e outra para agir como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada controlo também tem de ter um ponto de ligação se definido; no caso do fornecedor, o ponto de ligação tem de ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre ligações de peças Web, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [descrição geral das ligações de peças Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> da ligação atual.
